mapper.select: select * from commercial_factoring_statistic order by year asc ;
select IF(`foreign`,'外资企业','内资企业') name , count(1) value from commercial_factoring_extra group by `foreign` ;
select a.`name` name , count(1) value from company c , area a where c.company_type=10 and a.area_id=c.area_id group by a.name;

select season name,SUM(registered_capital) sum ,count(1) count from ( select CONCAT(YEAR(c.registered_date),'Q',quarter( c.registered_date )) season , c.registered_capital from company c where c.company_type=10 ) b GROUP BY b.season ORDER BY season
